login.metaDescription: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

home.metaDescription: Blogy is a simple web application using NextJs, it serves as a open source boilerplate for NextJs 14 applications.

dashboard.metaDescription: My personal space where I can access all my data and manage my account.

articles.metaDescription: Articles I have written with passion.
